Summary: A tiny prototypical flying saucer appeared in the sky then instantly moved to a hover 1 ft. in front of us
divs: Sighting DetailsMy two cousins and I were playing in the alley at my grandmother's house in the summer of 1982. I was 7. My cousins were 8 and 12. I noticed a shimmer in the sky at an unknown height. We stared at it for about 20 seconds wondering out loud what it was. It disappeared and simultaneously re-appeared directly in front of us at eye level within reach (about 1 ft. away). It was a typical flying saucer about 3 inches in diameter! It had rows of windows just above the midline and there were beings inside. I cannot describe the beings as I have no recollection of what they looked like. I only remember (very vividly) that they were making eye contact with me. I was not scared. I was in awe. It just disappeared without a trace. My cousins and I talked about it briefly but we didn't really discuss it after that until about 1995 when I brought it up. My cousin who was 8 at the time doesn't remember it at all. My cousin (his sister) who was 12 remembers it clearly. I have been looking for years for a story of a similar encounter, but have yet to find one.
